Should put it lightly, it's encouraging it seems to have hit a connection with almost all of you so quickly. Early participation in the initial bounty campaign really fueled Mallconomy's optimism that Mallconomy is creating one that will genuinely raise the bar with what a Metaverse like us can achieve.When will the Mallconomy Bounty Campaign finally come to an end?With Mallconomy bounty campaign should end before the tokens creation activity, which is presently anticipated for Q4 2022, giving Bounty Campaign $WOOT holder access to its native token beforehand virtually everyone else.I'm not a TEAM from Mallconomy, this information is very good and provides great opportunities for bounty hunters. We wish the project success and we become part of the token holders. The tokens you get will be directly credited to the platform.
